mainText:
With his candle burnt out, the world will seems dimmer without him. He was a
truly remarkable man that I never knew personally but I always looked up to
as visionary and great leader. He inspired me as child and fascinated me
with his ideas through his products from computers to iPods to iPhones and
iPads. His candle burned twice as bright as any man and will definitely
leave a mark on mankind for generations to come and I am glad and honored to
say I lived and experienced his innovations first hand. God bless you in
your time of mourning.
author: Shawn
